top_comments.comment: i would love to see doom eternal and doom 2016, and destiny 2 !
I hope world war z aftermath can also be include in firearms expert reacts

comments_since_last_sample.body: "you can whack out all your shots a little bit quicker" _Jonathan Ferguson, keeper of the  Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries
Spent casings on the M249 are ejecting from the wrong port. The upper port is supposed to eject the disintegrated links. The lower port ejects the spent casing.
Only real gun enthusiasts will know the difference between the AK 47 and the AKM. Video gamers on the other hand think they know more than Larry Vickers + Ian McCollum.
Ahh I caught one. That is an A3 upper not an A2 upper in the game. That is a detachable carry handle.
i think Jonathan just named the inevitable DLC: "Left behind and eaten."
Check out the Weapons of Halo next
Having Jonathan doing GTA guns wouldn't hurt, would be funny to see his reactions
